get_embed_options_from_source_and_options(source,options)

generate the embed tag from the global options

[Source]

     # File lib/simple_object.rb, line 104
104:   def get_embed_options_from_source_and_options(source,options)
105:     embed_options = {:width=>(options[:width]||SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_WIDTH),
106:                       :height=>(options[:height]||SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_HEIGHT),
107:                       :src=>source
108:                     }
109:     case source
110:     when /mov/
111:       embed_options[:controller] = params[:controller]||"true"
112:       embed_options[:target] = "quicktime"
113:       embed_options[:pluginspage] = "http://www.apple.com/quicktime"
114:     when /swf/
115:       embed_options[:quality] = "high"
116:       embed_options[:bgcolor] = options[:bgcolor]||"transparent"
117:       embed_options[:type] = options[:type]||"application/x-shockwave-flash"
118:       embed_options[:pluginspage] = "http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"
119:     when /wmv/i,/avi/i,/mpg/i,/mpeg/i,/mp4/i
120:       embed_options[:type] = "application/x-mplayer2" 
121:       embed_options[:autostart] = "1" 
122:       embed_options[:scale] = "aspect" 
123:       embed_options[:showcontrols] = "1"      
124:     end
125:     return embed_options
126:   end
get_object_options_from_source_and_options(source,options)

generate the attributes for the object tag

[Source]

     # File lib/simple_object.rb, line 80
 80:   def get_object_options_from_source_and_options(source,options)
 81: 
 82:     case source
 83:     when /mov/
 84:       return {:width=>(options[:width]||SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_WIDTH),
 85:               :height=>(options[:height]||SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_HEIGHT),
 86:               :vspace=>(options[:vspace]||"0"),
 87:               :hspace=>(options[:hspace]||"0"),
 88:               :codebase=>"http://www.apple.com/qtactivex/qtplugin.cab",
 89:               :classid=>"clsid:02BF25D5-8C17-4B23-BC80-D3488ABDDC6B"}
 90:     when /swf/
 91:       return {:codebase=>"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=5,0,0,0", 
 92:               :classid=>"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"}
 93:       
 94:     when /wmv/i,/avi/i,/mpg/i,/mpeg/i,/mp4/i
 95:       return {:width=>(options[:width]||SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_WIDTH),
 96:               :height=>(options[:height]||SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_HEIGHT),
 97:               :classid=>"CLSID:22D6F312-B0F6-11D0-94AB-0080C74C7E95",
 98:               :scale=>(options[:scale]||"aspect")}
 99:     end
100:     return {}
101:   end
get_param_tags_for_source_and_options(source,options)

generate sensible param tags

[Source]

    # File lib/simple_object.rb, line 36
36:   def get_param_tags_for_source_and_options(source,options)
37:     param_tags = [param_tag(:src,source)]
38:     options[:width] ||= SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_WIDTH
39:     options[:height] ||= SimpleObjectHelper::DEFAULT_HEIGHT
40:     
41:     case source
42:     when /mov/
43:       options[:target] ||= "quicktime"
44:       options[:controller] ||= "true"
45:       options[:kioskmode] ||= "false"
46:     when /swf/
47:       options[:movie] ||= source
48:       options[:src] ||= source
49:       options[:wmode] ||= "transparent"
50:       options[:loop] ||= "false"
51:       options[:quality] ||= "high"
52:       options[:salign] ||= ""
53:       options[:menu] ||= "-1"
54:       options[:base] ||= ""
55:       options[:allowscriptaccess] ||= "always"
56:       options[:scale] ||= "showall"
57:       options[:devicefont] ||= "0"
58:       options[:embedmovie] ||= "0"
59:       options[:bgcolor] ||= "transparent"
60:       options[:swremote] ||= ""
61:       options[:moviedata] ||= ""
62:       options[:seamlesstabbing] ||= "1"
63:     when /wmv/i,/avi/i,/mpg/i,/mpeg/i,/mp4/i
64:       options[:filename] ||= source
65:       options[:bgcolor] ||= "transparent"
66:       options[:autostart] ||= "1"
67:       options[:scale] ||= "aspect"
68:       options[:type] ||= "application/x-mplayer2"
69:       options[:showcontrols] ||= "1"
70:       options[:windowlessvideo] ||= "0"
71:     end
72:     
73:     options.each do |key,value|
74:       param_tags << param_tag(key,value)
75:     end
76:     return param_tags
77:   end
param_tag(name,value)

generate a single param tag

[Source]

    # File lib/simple_object.rb, line 31
31:   def param_tag(name,value)
32:     tag :param, :name=>name,:value=>value unless value.blank?
33:   end
simple_object_tag(source, options = {})

Renders an object/embed tag for media! You can pass whatever parameters make sense, But the goal of this is to glean as many default parameters from the source filename as possible.

[Source]

    # File lib/simple_object.rb, line 14
14:   def simple_object_tag(source, options = {})
15:     
16:     # The OBJECT Tag gets built last, with the inner tags, and
17:     # content-defined attributes
18:     content = get_param_tags_for_source_and_options(source,options)
19:     content << embed_tag(get_embed_options_from_source_and_options(source,options))
20:     content_tag :object, content.join("\n"), get_object_options_from_source_and_options(source,options)
21:   
22:   end

[Validate]
